name: Structure: Greatbow
description:
Must be added when weapon is first obtained.

Range +2. Mt +6. Crit +20. This weapon can only make one attack per turn and only on its wielder's phase; as an action, target a space within range, and at the beginning of the wielder's next phase, make an attack against a unit in or adjacent to target space without using an action.

Disabled on non-Bows and on weapons with another "Structure" attribute.
